text: Hugo Banzer Suárez (May 10, 1926 - May 5, 2002) was a Bolivian politician, military general, and dictator. He was the President of Bolivia. He held the Bolivian presidency twice: from 1971 to 1978, as a dictator; and then again from 1997 to his resignation in 2001. Banzer was born in Concepción, Santa Cruz. He studied at the School of the Americas. Banzer died on May 5, 2002 in Santa Cruz, Bolivia from lung cancer, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * On the crisis of December 1977 (video) Category:1926 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Presidents of Bolivia Category:Former dictators
title: Hugo Banzer
